casebody.data:
CITY OF LAS VEGAS, a Political Subdivision of the State of Nevada, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Timothy C. Williams, District Judge, Respondents,
and
180 Land Co., LLC, a Nevada Limited-Liability Company, Real Party in Interest. No. 78792 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED May 24, 2019

DENIED.
